intro.title: Welcome to Favour Kelvin's Portfolio
intro.description: Hello! I'm Favour Kelvin, and I'm thrilled to share a glimpse of my journey with you ðŸ˜ƒ. I am a Technical Writer with a strong background in Software Engineering. My career began as a software developer, where I discovered my passion for open-source projects. I have had the privilege of participating in three Google Open Source programs: Google Summer of Code, Google Code-In, and Google Season of Docs.

As a dedicated technical writer, I excel in creating clear, detailed, and user-friendly API documentation that facilitates seamless integration and interaction with software systems. Below, you'll find a sample of my work in this realm:
